name: Flitto
overview: Looking to break down language barriers in different content such as Twitter, Comics, Social Commerce Travel Information etc. Flitto is designed to let users read all content in their own language with claimed perfect translation from users. Translations are crowdsourced, with translators matched to content that interests them.

external_links.title: Technology and culture to drive East Asia’s next digital revolution
Springboard Mobile kicks off, and we’ll be following the startup teams in a new video series
